name: Candev.TeamEdit
description: Creates a VueForm for the team dashboard
author: StatCan Digital Innovation

Template.Text:
<v-card outlined>
        <v-card-title>
            [locale en]Edit my team[/locale]
            [locale fr]Modifier mon équipe[/locale]
        </v-card-title>
        <v-card-text>

            <validation-provider name="{{ "teamNameLabel" | localize }}" rules="required" v-slot="{ errors, valid }">
                <v-text-field name="teamName" v-model="teamName" :success="valid" :error-messages="errors" filled="filled" label="{{ "teamNameLabel" | localize }}"></v-text-field>
            </validation-provider>
            <validation-provider name="{{ "teamDescriptionLabel" | localize }}" rules="required" v-slot="{ errors, valid }">
                <v-text-field name="teamDescription" v-model="teamDescription" :success="valid" :error-messages="errors" filled="filled" label="{{ "teamDescriptionLabel" | localize }}"></v-text-field>
            </validation-provider>
			<sort-draggable :list="topics"
                            title="{{ "topicsTitleLabel" | localize }}"
                            hint="{{ "topicsHintLabel" | localize }}">
            </sort-draggable>
            </br>
        <v-alert type="success" v-if="form.successMessage">
          {% raw %}{{ form.successMessage }}{% endraw %}
        </v-alert>
        <v-alert type="error" v-if="form.serverValidationMessage">
          {% raw %}{{ form.serverValidationMessage[0] }}{% endraw %}
        </v-alert>
    	<v-btn type="submit" depressed block @click="formHandleSubmit" :disabled="form.submitting">[locale en]Save[/locale][locale fr]Sauvegarder[/locale]</v-btn>
        </v-card-text>
    </v-card>
